title: Coco Genki
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Japanese, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Japanese-run kitchen making food with international influences. Changing weekly menu lists the vegan choices with sample dishes such as pumpking soup, house-made seitan burger, gado gado salad with tofu, whole wheat spaghetti. Vegan desserts such as apple cake and pumpkin mouse. No Wi-Fi.
